L A N G U A G E S
P R O F I L E   S U M M A R Y
Results-driven .NET Developer with over 4.5 years of hands-on experience in
developing  and  maintaining  scalable  applications  using  the  .NET  framework.
Adept at building robust backend solutions complemented by 1 year of practical
experience in React.js for modern, responsive front-end development. Proven
ability to translate business requirements into efficient technical solutions.

improving compliance by 30%.
